articles.author: Gemma Mullin
articles.title: Coronavirus symptoms in kids DON’T always start with a cough and could be sickness or diarrhoea - The Sun
articles.content:
CORONAVIRUS symptoms in kids don't always start with a cough, a new study has found.
Experts claim that sickness and diarrhoea should also be considered an early warning sign of Covid-19 in children.
 Experts say coronavirus symptoms in children don't alway… [+3737 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: Earlier Scottish lockdown 'could have prevented 2,000 deaths' - BBC News
articles.description: Scientists suggest that earlier action could have reduced the Covid-19 death rate in Scotland by about 80%.
articles.content:
Image caption
 Dougie Chambers and Andy and Mary Leaman all died after contracting Covid-19
More than 2,000 coronavirus deaths could have been prevented if Scotland had locked down two weeks earlier, according to a new study.

articles.title: NHS tracing app 'does not work on some Huawei mobiles and older phones' - Watford Observer
articles.description: Some new Huawei phones and some older mobiles cannot run the NHS contact tracing app being trialled on the Isle of Wight, NHSX has said.
articles.content:
Some new Huawei phones and some older mobiles cannot run the NHS contact tracing app being trialled on the Isle of Wight, NHSX has said.
